Module count
Package count.model

Class MixedRateGradient

java.lang.Object
count.model.MixedRateGradient
public class MixedRateGradient
extends Object
Computing the likelihood and its base-rate gradient in a rate-multiplier model.
Author:
csuros

    • table

      private final UniqueProfileTable table

    • pool

      private static final ForkJoinPool pool
      Same thread pool across different instantiations. (Not likely to be an issue through GUI but in a big model-selection procedure, this class might be instantiated many times.)

    • class_gradients

      private final Gradient[] class_gradients
      First cells for classes with non-0 class probability; empty cells up to @link #mixed_model} class count

      public void setCalculationWidthThresholds​(int absolute, double relative)
      Sets up truncated likelihood calculations: at ancestors, the maximum copy number assumed is given by the minimum between the absolute threshold and the product of the relative threshold times maximum copy number observed.

      absolute -
      relative -

    • inferDistributionGradient

      public double inferDistributionGradient​(int node, int param_type, double[] gradient)
      Inverts 4-parameter rate gradients into 3-parameter distribution gradients.
      Parameters:
      node -
      param_type - GLDParameters.PARAMETER_GAIN, GLDParameters.PARAMETER_LOSS or GLDParameters.PARAMETER_DUPLICATION
      gradient - 4-parameter per node
      Returns:
      partial derivative by the base model's distribution parameter for the given node
